520  ‡aProvides public access to an open-access annual report to reveal structural inequalities that had previously created disparities based on race, ethnicity, gender, socioeconomic status, and other markers exploded due to the COVID-19 pandemic in legal education.^
5880 ‡aContents viewed December 3, 2021; title from home page.^
